title: October...Surprise? Supreme Court Omen? 10.21.20
itunes:title: October...Surprise? Supreme Court Omen? 10.21.20
description:
In episode 741, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Chris Crofton to discuss some Trump 2020 complaints, American's worrying about another civil war, the case that the Pennsylvania Supreme Court decided not to overturn, The Cabin, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. On Fox & Friends, Trump says Bill Barr's "gotta act" on the NY Post's Hunter Biden stories, "and this has to be known about before the election."
  2. Trump is about to deliver a pandemic speech in Prescott, Arizona. Follow for a video thread.
  3. Our letter to the BDC (Biden Debate Commission)
  4. GOP pollster Luntz blasts Trump campaign as worst he's ever seen
  5. Americans worry about 2020 being another 2000, but the real worry is another 1876
  6. Supreme Court Hints at a Bush v. Gore Redux, With Barrett Breaking the Tie
  7. WATCH: Moses Sumney & James Blake - Make Out in My Car (James Blake Remix)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
